00018  *  it in Xcode and open it's "Info". To enable mixed compilation,
00019  *  for the file's "File Type" select: "sourcecode.cpp.objcpp".

00059 static NSString *kOOChildren = @".children", *kOOTagName = @"@tagName", *kOOTagPrefix = @"@tagPrefix", *kOONodeText = @".nodeText";

00061 /*=================================================================================*/
00062 /*============ Parse NSData XML into OODictionary representation ==================*/

00064 enum OOXMLParserOpts {
00065     OOXMLDefaultParser = 0x0,
00066     OOXMLPreserveWhitespace = 0x1,
00067     OOXMLPreserveCData = 0x2,
00068     OOXMLRecursive = 0x4,
00069     // not implemented...
00070     OOXMLRecursiveAtAnyLevel = 0x4,
00071     OOXMLNamespaceSelect = 0x10,
00072     OOXMLNamespaceSelectAtAnyLevel = 0x20
00073 };
00074 
00075 enum OOXMLWriterOpts {
00076     OOXMLPrettyPrint = 0x1,
00077     OOXMLDefaultWriter = OOXMLPrettyPrint
00078 };
00079 
00080 class OONodeSub;
00081 
00082 /**
00083  Subclass of OODictionary<OOString> to manipulate XML documents. On parsing as XML document
00084  one OONode is created for each element in the document with the attribute values stored
00085  as a NSString under a key: "@attributeName". Children of an element, be they pure text
00086  or sub elements are accumulated in an NSMutableArray under the key @".children" as well
00087  as in an array with the elements tagName (element name) as the key. This allows simple
00088  xpath expressions such as document[@"root/child"] to be evaluated by breaking up the
00089  path into the equivalent of document[@"root"][0][@"child"][0]. To gain efficient
00090  access to the text inside an element it is also stores under the key @".nodeText"
00091  in it's parent element.
00092  */
00093 
00094 class OONode : public OODictionary<OOString> {
00095 public:
00096     oo_inline OONode( id node ) {
00097         set( node );
00098     }
00099     oo_inline OONode( const OONode &node ) { 
00100         *this = node;
00101     }
00102     oo_inline OONode() {
00103         [alloc() setObject:(id)kCFNull forKey:kOOTagName];
00104     }
00105     oo_inline OONode( NSString *tagName ) {
00106         [alloc() setObject:tagName forKey:kOOTagName];
00107     }
00108     oo_inline OONode( const OOString &tagName, const OOString &nodeText = nil ) {
00109         [alloc() setObject:tagName forKey:kOOTagName];
00110         if ( nodeText ) {
00111             [get() setObject:nodeText forKey:kOONodeText];
00112             OODictionary<OOArray<OOString> > node = get();
00113             NSMutableArray *children = node[kOOChildren].alloc( [NSMutableArray class] );
00114             [children addObject:nodeText];
00115         }
00116     }
00117     oo_inline OONode( NSData *xml, OOXMLParserOpts flags = OOXMLDefaultParser ) {
00118         parseXML( xml, flags );
00119     }
00120     
00121     oo_inline OONode &operator = ( const OONode &node ) { set( node.get() ); return *this; }
00122     oo_inline OONode &operator = ( NSData *val ) { return parseXML( val ); }
00123 
00124     OONode &parseXML( NSData *xml, OOXMLParserOpts flags = OOXMLDefaultParser );
00125     OOReference<NSData *> writeXML( OOXMLWriterOpts flags = OOXMLDefaultWriter ) const;
00126 
00127     oo_inline operator OOReference<NSData *> () const {
00128         return writeXML();
00129     }
00130     
00131     oo_inline OONode &operator += ( const OONode &val ) {
00132         OODictionary<OONodeArray > node = get();
00133         NSMutableArray *children = node[kOOChildren].alloc( [NSMutableArray class] );
00134         [children addObject:val.get()];
00135         NSString *tagName = [val objectForKey:kOOTagName];
00136         if ( tagName && tagName != (id)kCFNull ) {
00137             NSMutableArray *siblings = node[tagName].alloc( [NSMutableArray class] );
00138             [siblings addObject:val.get()];
00139         }
00140         return *this;
00141     }
00142     
00143     oo_inline OONodeSub operator [] ( id sub ) const;
00144     oo_inline OONodeSub operator [] ( const char *sub ) const;
00145     
00146     oo_inline OONodeArray children() const {
00147         return [get() objectForKey:kOOChildren];
00148     }
00149     oo_inline OONode child( int which = 0 ) const {
00150         return children()[ which ];
00151     }
00152     oo_inline OOString text( int which = 0 ) const {
00153         return (id)child( which ).get();
00154     }
00155     
00156     oo_inline OOArraySub<OONode> operator [] ( int sub ) const;
00157 };
00158 
00159 /**
00160  Internal class repesenting selecting of a node from an xpath selection.
00161  */
00162 
00163 class OONodeArraySub : public OOArraySub<OOString> {
00164     friend class OONodeSub;
00165 
00166     OONodeArraySub( OODictionarySub<NSMutableArray *> *ref, int sub ) : OOArraySub<OOString>( ref,  sub ) { }
00167 
00168     OOArraySub<NSMutableDictionary *> *nodeReference( BOOL refer = YES ) {
00169         if ( refer && this->dref->aref->references )
00170             this->dref->aref->references++;
00171         return this->dref->aref;
00172     }
00173 
00174 protected:
00175     oo_inline virtual id set( id val ) const {
00176         OOArraySub<OOString>::set( val );
00177         if ( ![kOOChildren isEqualToString:dref->key] ) {
00178             NSMutableDictionary *parentNode = root ? (NSMutableDictionary *)root->get() : dref->parent( YES );
00179             OODictionary<OONodeArray> node( parentNode );
00180             OONodeArray children = node[kOOChildren].alloc( [NSMutableArray class] );
00181             children += OONode( val );
00182             if ( ![val objectForKey:kOOTagName] )
00183                 [val setObject:dref->key forKey:kOOTagName];
00184         }
00185         return val;
00186     }
00187 
00188 public:
00189     oo_inline OONode node() {
00190         return nodeReference( NO )->get();  
00191     }
00192     oo_inline operator OONode () {
00193         return node();
00194     }
00195     
00196     oo_inline OONodeSub operator [] ( id sub );
00197     oo_inline OONodeSub operator [] ( const char *sub );
00198 };
00199 
00200 /**
00201  Internal class repesenting selection of node from XPath expression. Normally this
00202  is the OOString value of the first node selected by the xpath expression but can
00203  be cast to the first node itself or an array of all qualifying nodes.
00204  */
00205 
00206 class OONodeSub : public OODictionarySub<OOString> {
00207     friend class OONodeArraySub;
00208     friend class OONode;    
00209     
00210     void supportXPath() {
00211         unichar char0 = [key length]>0 ? [key characterAtIndex:0] : 0;
00212         if ( char0 != '@' && char0 != '.' ) {
00213             NSArray *path = [this->key componentsSeparatedByString:@"/"];
00214             int pmax = [path count]-1, firstCharOfLast = [[path objectAtIndex:pmax] length] ? 
00215             [[path objectAtIndex:pmax] characterAtIndex:0] : 0;
00216 
00217             if ( firstCharOfLast != '@' && firstCharOfLast != '.' ) {
00218                 [(NSMutableArray *)(path = [[path mutableCopy] autorelease]) addObject:kOONodeText];
00219                 pmax++;
00220             }
00221             
00222             if ( pmax > 0 ) {
00223                 OODictionarySub<NSMutableArray *> *exp = this->root ? 
00224                 new OODictionarySub<NSMutableArray *>( this->root, [path objectAtIndex:0] ) :
00225                 new OODictionarySub<NSMutableArray *>( this->aref, [path objectAtIndex:0] );
00226                 exp->references = 1;
00227                 
00228                 OONodeArraySub *arr;
00229                 for ( int i=1 ; i<=pmax ; i++ ) {
00230                     int idx = 0;
00231                     NSString *p = [path objectAtIndex:i];
00232                     if ( [p length] && isdigit( [p characterAtIndex:0] ) ) {
00233                         idx = [p intValue];
00234                         i++;
00235                     }
00236                     arr = new OONodeArraySub( exp, idx );
00237                     arr->references = 1;
00238                     if ( i == pmax )
00239                         break;
00240                     if ( [@"*" isEqualToString:p = [path objectAtIndex:i]] )
00241                         p = kOOChildren;
00242                     exp = new OODictionarySub<NSMutableArray *>( (OOArraySub<NSMutableDictionary *> *)arr, p );
00243                     exp->references = 1;
00244                 }
00245                 
00246                 this->key = [path objectAtIndex:pmax];
00247                 this->root = NULL;
00248                 this->aref = (OOArraySub<NSMutableDictionary *> *)arr;
00249                 this->dref = NULL;
00250             }
00251         }
00252     }
00253 
00254     oo_inline OONodeSub( const OODictionary<OOString> *ref, id sub ) : OODictionarySub<OOString>( ref, sub ) {
00255         supportXPath();
00256     }
00257     oo_inline OONodeSub( OOArraySub<NSMutableDictionary *> *ref, id sub ) : OODictionarySub<OOString>( ref, sub ) {
00258         supportXPath();
00259     }
00260     oo_inline OONodeSub( OODictionarySub<NSMutableDictionary *> *ref, id sub ) : OODictionarySub<OOString>( ref, sub ) {
00261         supportXPath();
00262     }
00263 
00264 protected:
00265     oo_inline virtual id set( id val ) const {
00266         OODictionarySub<OOString>::set( val );
00267         if ( [kOONodeText isEqualToString:this->key] ) {
00268             OODictionary<OOArray<OOString> > node = this->parent( YES );
00269             NSMutableArray *children = node[kOOChildren].alloc( [NSMutableArray class] );
00270             [children addObject:val];
00271         }
00272         return val;
00273     }
00274     
00275 public:
00276     // assign and assign by mutable copy 
00277     oo_inline OONodeSub &operator = ( OOString val ) { set( val ); return *this; }
00278     oo_inline OONodeSub &operator = ( const char *val ) { *this = OOString( val ); return *this; }
00279     oo_inline OONodeSub &operator = ( const OOArraySub<OOString> &val ) { set( val.get() ); return *this; }
00280     oo_inline OONodeSub &operator = ( const OODictionarySub<OOString> &val ) { set( val.get() ); return *this; }
00281 
00282     oo_inline OONodeSub &operator = ( const OONode &val ) { this->aref->set( val.get() ); return *this; }
00283     oo_inline OONodeSub &operator += ( const OONode &val ) { OONode( this->parent(YES) ) += val; return *this; }
00284 
00285     oo_inline OONodeSub operator [] ( id sub ) const {
00286         if ( this->aref->references )
00287             this->aref->references++;
00288         return OONodeSub( this->aref, sub );
00289     }
00290     oo_inline OONodeSub operator [] ( const char *sub ) const {
00291         return (*this)[[NSString stringWithUTF8String:sub]];
00292     }   
00293     
00294     oo_inline OONodeArraySub operator [] ( int sub ) const {
00295         if ( this->aref->dref->references )
00296             this->aref->dref->references++;
00297         OONodeArraySub *node = new OONodeArraySub( this->aref->dref, sub );
00298         node->references = 1;
00299         OONodeSub *children = new OONodeSub( (OOArraySub<NSMutableDictionary *> *)node, kOOChildren );
00300         children->references = 1;
00301         return OONodeArraySub( (OODictionarySub<NSMutableArray*> *)children, 0 );
00302     }
00303 
00304     oo_inline operator OONodeArray () const {
00305         return nodes();
00306     }
00307     inline operator OONode () const {
00308         return node();
00309     }
00310     
00311     oo_inline OONodeArray nodes() const {
00312         return this->aref ? this->aref->parent( NO ) : nil;
00313     }
00314     inline OONode node( int which = 0 ) const {
00315         return nodes()[which];
00316     }
00317 
00318     oo_inline OONodeArray children() const {
00319         return [this->parent( NO ) objectForKey:kOOChildren];
00320     }
00321     inline OONode child( int which = 0 ) const {
00322         return children()[which];
00323     }
00324     
00325     inline OOStringDictionaryArray dictionaries() {
00326         OOStringDictionaryArray out;
00327         OONodeArray in = nodes();
00328         for ( NSMutableDictionary *n in *in ) {
00329             OOStringDictionary values;
00330             OONode node = n;
00331             for( NSString *key in [*node allKeys] ) {
00332                 unichar c0 = [key characterAtIndex:0];
00333                 if ( c0 == '.' || c0 == '@' )
00334                     continue;
00335                 values[key] = node[key];
00336             }
00337             out += values;
00338         }
00339         return out;
00340     }
00341     oo_inline operator OOStringDictionaryArray () {
00342         return dictionaries();
00343     }   
00344 };
00345 
00346 inline OONodeSub OONode::operator [] ( id sub ) const {
00347     return OONodeSub( this, sub );
00348 }
00349 
00350 inline OOArraySub<OONode> OONode::operator [] ( int sub ) const {
00351     OODictionarySub<OONode> *step1 = new OODictionarySub<OONode>( (OODictionary<OONode> *)this, kOOChildren );
00352     step1->references = 1;
00353     return (*step1)[sub];
00354 }
00355 
00356 inline OONodeSub OONode::operator [] ( const char *sub ) const {
00357     return (*this)[[NSString stringWithUTF8String:sub]];
00358 }
00359 
00360 inline OONodeSub OONodeArraySub::operator [] ( id sub ) {
00361     return OONodeSub( nodeReference(), sub );
00362 }
00363 
00364 inline OONodeSub OONodeArraySub::operator [] ( const char *sub ) {
00365     return OONodeSub( nodeReference(), [NSString stringWithUTF8String:sub] );
00366 }

00368 /*=================================================================================*/
00369 /*============ Parse XML NSData into OODictionary representation ==================*/
00370 
00371 static xmlSAXHandler ooSaxHandlers;
00372 
00373 /**
00374  SAX Parses an XML document into an OODictionary based represntation. See OONode class
00375  for description of structure generated.
00376  */
00377 
00378 class OOXMLSaxParser {
00379     OODictionary<NSString *> tagCache;
00380     xmlParserCtxtPtr context;
00381 public:
00382     OOXMLParserOpts flags;
00383     OOArray<id> children;
00384     OONodeArray stack;
00385     OONode index;
00386 
00387     OOXMLSaxParser( OOXMLParserOpts flags = OOXMLDefaultParser );
00388     
00389     oo_inline NSMutableString *unique( const char *value ) {
00390         NSString *tagString = [[NSString alloc] initWithUTF8String:value],
00391                     *unique = tagCache[tagString];
00392         if ( !unique )
00393             tagCache[tagString] = unique = tagString;
00394         [tagString release];
00395         return (NSMutableString *)unique;
00396     }
00397 
00398     oo_inline void addNode( id node, const char *utf8String = NULL, int len = 0 ) {
00399         OONode parent = stack[-1];
00400         if ( !children )
00401             children = parent[kOOChildren].alloc( [NSMutableArray class] );
00402 
00403         if ( utf8String ) {
00404             static OOPattern nonWhiteSpace = OOString( @"\\S" );
00405             OOArray<OOString> textChildren = children;
00406             regmatch_t match[] = {{0, len}};
00407             OOString text = node;
00408 
00409             if ( children>0 && [*children[-1] isKindOfClass:[NSMutableString class]] )
00410                 *textChildren[-1] += node;
00411             else if ( flags & OOXMLPreserveWhitespace || nonWhiteSpace.exec( utf8String, 0, match, REG_STARTEND ) ) {
00412                 textChildren += text;
00413                 if ( ![*parent objectForKey:kOONodeText] )
00414                     [*parent setObject:node forKey:kOONodeText];
00415             }
00416         }
00417         else
00418             children += node;
00419     }
00420 
00421     oo_inline int parse( NSData *chunk ) {
00422         if ( !context ) {
00423             OONode root;
00424             if ( flags & OOXMLRecursive )
00425                 root["/"] = index = OONode();
00426             stack = OONodeArray( root, nil );
00427             context = xmlCreatePushParserCtxt( &ooSaxHandlers, this, NULL, 0, NULL);
00428             children = 0;
00429         }
00430         
00431         return xmlParseChunk(context, (const char *)[chunk bytes], [chunk length], 0);
00432     }
00433 
00434     oo_inline OONode rootNodeForXMLData( NSData *xml = nil ) {
00435         if ( xml )
00436             parse( xml );
00437         xmlParseChunk(context, NULL, 0, 1);
00438         xmlFreeParserCtxt(context);
00439         context = NULL;
00440         return --stack;
00441     }
00442 };
00443 
00444 static void objcppStartElement(void *ctx, const xmlChar *localname, const xmlChar *prefix, const xmlChar *URI, 
00445                                int nb_namespaces, const xmlChar **namespaces, 
00446                                int nb_attributes, int nb_defaulted, const xmlChar **attributes) {
00447     OOXMLSaxParser &sax = *(OOXMLSaxParser *)ctx;
00448     OOString tagName = sax.unique( (const char *)localname );
00449     OONode element = OONode( tagName );
00450     char name[10000];
00451 
00452     if ( prefix )
00453         [element setObject:sax.unique( (const char *)prefix ) forKey:kOOTagPrefix];
00454 
00455     for ( int ns=0 ; ns < nb_namespaces ; ns++ ) {
00456         struct _ns { const char *prefix, *nsURI; } *nptr = 
00457         (struct _ns *)(namespaces + ns*sizeof *nptr/sizeof nptr->prefix);
00458 
00459         snprintf( name, sizeof name-1, nptr->prefix ? "@xmlns:%s" : "@xmlns", nptr->prefix );
00460         [element setObject:sax.unique( nptr->nsURI ) forKey:sax.unique( name )];
00461     }
00462 
00463     for ( int attr_no=0 ; attr_no < nb_attributes ; attr_no++ ) {
00464         struct _attrs { const char *localName, *prefix, *uri, *value, *end; } *aptr = 
00465         (struct _attrs *)(attributes + attr_no*sizeof *aptr/sizeof aptr->localName);
00466         int vlen = aptr->end-aptr->value;
00467 
00468         OOString value( aptr->value, vlen );
00469         // attribute value fix required due to libxml2 bug...
00470         if ( strnstr( aptr->value, "&#38;", vlen ) != NULL )
00471             value = [value stringByReplacingOccurrencesOfString:@"&#38;" withString:@"&"];
00472 
00473         snprintf( name, sizeof name-1, "@%s", aptr->localName );
00474         [element setObject:sax.unique( value ) forKey:sax.unique( name )];
00475     }
00476 
00477     sax.stack += element;
00478     sax.children = 0;
00479 };
00480 
00481 static void objcppEndElement(void *ctx, const xmlChar *localname, const xmlChar *prefix, const xmlChar *URI) {    
00482     OOXMLSaxParser &sax = *(OOXMLSaxParser *)ctx;
00483     OONode element = sax.stack--;
00484     OONode parent = sax.stack[-1];
00485     parent += element;
00486     if ( sax.flags & OOXMLRecursive )
00487         sax.index += element;
00488     sax.children = 0;
00489 }
00490 
00491 static void objcppCharacters(void *ctx, const xmlChar *ch, int len) {
00492     OOXMLSaxParser &sax = *(OOXMLSaxParser *)ctx;
00493     sax.addNode( OOString( (const char *)ch, len ), (const char *)ch, len );
00494 }
00495 
00496 static void objcppCData(void *ctx, const xmlChar *value, int len) {
00497     OOXMLSaxParser &sax = *(OOXMLSaxParser *)ctx;
00498     NSData *data = [[NSData alloc] initWithBytes:value length:len];
00499     sax.addNode( data );
00500     [data release];
00501 }
00502 
00503 static void objcppSAXError(void *ctx, const char *msg, ...) {
00504     va_list argp; va_start(argp, msg);
00505     NSLogv( "OOXMLSaxParser Error - "+OOString( msg ), argp );
00506     va_end( argp );
00507 }
00508 
00509 inline OOXMLSaxParser::OOXMLSaxParser( OOXMLParserOpts flags ) {
00510     this->flags = flags;
00511 
00512     if ( !ooSaxHandlers.initialized ) {
00513         ooSaxHandlers.startElementNs = objcppStartElement;
00514         ooSaxHandlers.endElementNs = objcppEndElement;
00515         ooSaxHandlers.characters = objcppCharacters;
00516         ooSaxHandlers.initialized = XML_SAX2_MAGIC;
00517         ooSaxHandlers.error = objcppSAXError;
00518     }
00519     
00520     ooSaxHandlers.cdataBlock = this->flags & OOXMLPreserveCData ? objcppCData : NULL;
00521     context = NULL;
00522 }
00523 
00524 inline OONode &OONode::parseXML( NSData *xml, OOXMLParserOpts flags ) {
00525     return *this = OOXMLSaxParser( flags ).rootNodeForXMLData( xml );
00526 }
00527 
00528 /*=================================================================================*/
00529 /*======================== Convert Dictionary back to NSData XML ==================*/
00530 
00531 /**
00532  Class to convert OODictionary representation of XML into an NSData structure to be written to the net.
00533  */
00534 
00535 class OOXMLWriter {
00536 public:
00537     OOXMLWriterOpts flags;
00538     xmlTextWriterPtr writer;
00539     char name[1000], value[10000];
00540     int level;
00541 
00542     oo_inline void indent() {
00543         static char spaces[] = "                                                                ";
00544         checkrc( "xmlTextWriterWriteFormatString", xmlTextWriterWriteFormatString( writer, "\n%.*s", level*2, spaces ) );
00545     }
00546     
00547     oo_inline void checkrc( const char *what, int rc ) {
00548         if ( rc < 0 )
00549             OOWarn( @"Error code returned from %s(): %d", what, rc );
00550     }
00551     
00552     void traverse( OONode node ) {
00553         NSString *tagName = [*node objectForKey:kOOTagName];
00554 
00555         if ( tagName && tagName != (id)kCFNull ) {
00556             if ( flags & OOXMLPrettyPrint && level )
00557                 indent();
00558             level++;
00559 
00560             NSString *tagPrefix = [*node objectForKey:kOOTagPrefix];
00561             if ( tagPrefix ) {
00562                 [tagPrefix getCString:name maxLength:sizeof name-1 encoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
00563                 strcat( name, ":" );
00564             }
00565             else
00566                 name[0] = '\000';
00567             
00568             [tagName getCString:name+strlen(name) maxLength:sizeof name-1-strlen(name) encoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
00569             checkrc( "xmlTextWriterStartElement", xmlTextWriterStartElement( writer, (xmlChar *)name ) );
00570 
00571             for ( NSString *attr in [*node allKeys] ) {
00572                 if ( attr == kOOTagName || attr == kOOTagPrefix || [attr length] == 0 || [attr characterAtIndex:0] != '@' )
00573                     continue;
00574                 [attr getCString:name maxLength:sizeof name-1 encoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
00575                 [[*node objectForKey:attr] getCString:value maxLength:sizeof value-1 encoding:NSUTF8StringEncoding];
00576                 checkrc( "xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute", xmlTextWriterWriteAttribute( writer, (xmlChar *)name+1, (xmlChar *)value ) );
00577             }           
00578         }
00579 
00580         BOOL hadChildElements = NO;
00581         OONodeArray children = node.children();
00582         for ( id child in *children )
00583             if ( [child isKindOfClass:[NSString class]] )
00584                 checkrc( "xmlTextWriterWriteString", xmlTextWriterWriteString( writer, (xmlChar *)[child UTF8String] ) );
00585             else if ( [child isKindOfClass:[NSData class]] )
00586                 checkrc( "xmlTextWriterWriteFormatCDATA", xmlTextWriterWriteFormatCDATA( writer, "%.*s", [child length], (char *)[child bytes] ) );
00587             else {
00588                 traverse( child );
00589                 hadChildElements = YES;
00590             }
00591 
00592         if ( tagName != (id)kCFNull ) {
00593             level--;
00594             if ( flags & OOXMLPrettyPrint && hadChildElements )
00595                 indent();
00596             checkrc( "xmlTextWriterEndElement", xmlTextWriterEndElement( writer ) );
00597         }
00598     }
00599 
00600     oo_inline OOXMLWriter( OOXMLWriterOpts flags = OOXMLDefaultWriter ) {
00601         this->flags = flags;
00602         level = 0;
00603     }
00604 
00605     oo_inline OOReference<NSData *> dataForNode( const OONode &node ) {
00606         xmlBufferPtr buf = xmlBufferCreate();
00607         writer = xmlNewTextWriterMemory(buf, 0);
00608 
00609         NSString *encoding = *node[@"@encoding"];
00610         checkrc( "xmlTextWriterStartDocument", xmlTextWriterStartDocument(writer, NULL, encoding ? [encoding UTF8String] : "UTF-8", NULL) );
00611 
00612         traverse( node );
00613 
00614         xmlTextWriterEndDocument(writer);
00615         xmlFreeTextWriter(writer);
00616 
00617         OOReference<NSData *> data = [[NSData alloc] initWithBytes:buf->content length:strlen((const char *)buf->content)];
00618         xmlBufferFree(buf);
00619         [*data release];
00620         return data;
00621     }
00622 };
00623 
00624 inline OOReference<NSData *> OONode::writeXML( OOXMLWriterOpts flags ) const {
00625     return OOXMLWriter( flags ).dataForNode( *this );
00626 }
